name: NoLockout
short_description:
This little utility is a temporary bypass of Windows screen saver lockout. While you could edit the registry, on company owned computers this will generally be reset by the GPO security policies at login time.

This little utility is to temporarily allow bypassing the lockout, basically by moving the mouse a pixel or two. Do NOT use this to circumvent corporate security! This was written for when displaying PowerPoint presentations on a Windows laptop, and not actually touching the mouse or keyboard to cause Windows to see any activity.
summary: Temporarily keep Windows desktop screen saver from locking
